shadow.name: FAILURE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Duration, expressing through failure

gift.name: PRESERVATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Duration, expressing through preservation

siddhi.name: VENERATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Duration, expressing through veneration

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 32 shadow frequency. The failure you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural preservation. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from failure to preservation.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your spleen. Notice the sensation of failure.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 32 consciously for 7 days, the failure pattern will shift toward preservation.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 32 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from failure toward preservation
